download.management

Class FileDownloadStatus

  • java.lang.Object
    • download.management.FileDownloadStatus
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Download, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable

    public class FileDownloadStatus
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, Download, java.io.Serializable
    Status of a dataset file download. Also, implements Runnable to download the DatasetFile in separated thread.
    Author:
    Karem Terry
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • setToDownload

        public RecordReplica setToDownload()
        Configure file to download and get configured file replica. Verify that exist system file assigned to current download in case that the file record state were paused. If a file replica isn't configured, choose a random replica.
        Returns:
        RecordReplica that is a replica from where the file will be downloaded
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if file isn't in state CREATED OR PAUSED
